version_description:
* Transit charts! Each transit now comes with a picture to visualize what it means
* Fixes bug that prevented some users from entering their birth details
* Improves UI with better error messages & loading screens

• Added popups to make the daily horoscope a more clear because it turns out vague and confusing isn’t always fun. (Who would have thought?)
• More bug fixes!

• More bug fixes!

- You can now edit your username in settings instead of emailing us!
- Fixed a bug that didn't let some users skip push notification screen :)
- Fixed a bug that would make some text screens look as if they could be edited (you could never actually edit them)
- A ton of other small bug fixes and ui changes

- Fixed a bug that would make some text screens look as if they could be edited (you could never actually edit them)
- A ton of other small bug fixes and ui changes

• You asked, and we listened – we reorganized daily summary section to be less confusing. Tell us what you think, we’re rolling out a few more changes over the next few weeks.
• We no longer require a phone number for sign up. But if you already signed up with a phone number, then you should still sign in with your phone number.
• Bug fixes: you can remove friends and send us feedback without worrying about crashes!

We killed the confusing glyphs and words with a “visually sick” (real quote from a beta user!) redesign. A few more changes coming over the next couple weeks – tell us what you think! (And email us if you want access to the beta -> horoscopes@costarastrology.com)

• Why use words when you can say it in STICKERS?
• Once you read a transit, the card turns grey so you can tell.
• Don’t know what trine or sextile means? That’s chill, we translated everything into “human” language.
• Fixed a bunch of bugs with add friends, let us know if you find more!

• You asked for it – add babies, pets, friends, etc. by typing in their info manually! (premium only)
• Couldn’t read those transit charts? We taught the AI how to explain it for you.
• Screwed with your birth time zone and now your chart’s wonky? We made a reset button for you.
• More bug fixes, crash fixes, etc. As always, looking for more, so keep sending feedback when you find them.

• DMs are here. Use them to: ask who people are, talk about how rough your love life is, and have people analyze your chart for you.
• Remove someone that you added manually if their chart isn’t up to par.
• Bug fixes, including quick add’s disappearing act.

• New chart summary graphic allows you to easily identify your signs, houses, and planets.
• We fixed push notifications. Tapping on your emoji notification now takes you directly to your updates. Tapping on new friend notifications takes you right to your compatibility chart.

We listened to your feedback and made a bunch of updates. Download the latest version of the app to:
- Find your daily push notification on the home screen. You can also read Your Day at a Glance for the past two days by tapping on those days in the calendar under your profile.
- See which friends have the same planet and sign alignment as you in their natal chart.
- See which friends experience the same planetary transit as you right now.

• New chart summary graphic allows you to easily identify your signs, houses, and planets.
• We fixed push notifications. Tapping on your emoji notification now takes you directly to your updates. Tapping on new friend notifications takes you right to your compatibility chart.
• Tapping on your chart won't crash :)

• Public view is here! Use this feature to turn your co-star profile into a public chart, accessible to friends who are not on the app.

• Edit birth info of friends you've added manually

We listened to your feedback and made a bunch of updates. Download the latest version of the app to:
- Find your daily push notification on the home screen. You can also read Your Day at a Glance for the past two days by tapping on those days in the calendar under your profile.
- See which friends have the same planet and sign alignment as you in their natal chart.
- See which friends experience the same planetary transit as you right now.

January is the saddest month of the year. We're here to help, with three new social features:
• daily relationship horoscopes, between you and your friends
• personalized profile photos
• clearer compatibility visualizations

• Advanced Chart - Your relationships
You are neither loveless nor alone. Take a deep dive into your relationship style, behaviors, and patterns with an advanced reading focused on your romantic strengths, challenges, and needs, including our take on how you can get what you never knew you always wanted.

• Also included in this release:
We rolled back our DM feature, as the platform that supported it was recently shut down by its developers.

Days feel obsolete. You’re measuring your life in new units — tracking the time between grocery runs, haircuts, and explosions of bottled-up emotion. We’re here to help you stay grounded, with a new home screen layout that keeps you focused on what you need to know now. The moment you open the app, our scrollable timeline surfaces your most urgent readings alongside a dynamic time, date, and weather display. And when you’re ready to think beyond the immediate, your original Co–Star updates calendar is nested just one click away.

This update also includes Sign in with Apple. Users can now securely create a Co–Star account using their Apple ID.

Days feel obsolete. You’re measuring your life in new units — tracking the time between grocery runs, haircuts, and explosions of bottled-up emotion. We’re here to help you stay grounded, with a new home screen layout that keeps you focused on what you need to know now. The moment you open the app, our scrollable timeline surfaces your most urgent readings alongside a dynamic time, date, and weather display. And when you’re ready to think beyond the immediate, your original Co–Star updates calendar is nested just one click away.

This update also includes Sign in with Apple. Users can now securely create a Co–Star account using their Apple ID.

Wish you could take a peek into your future? Our new long-term readings will tell you what challenges and opportunities are on the horizon for the next month, and what you should do now to prepare.

This release also includes new Chaos Mode prompts to inspire the notes you send your friends.

Introducing: Friend’s Advanced Chart
Take a deep dive into your friend’s relationship style, their behaviors, and patterns with an advanced reading focused on their romantic strengths, challenges, and needs—including our take on how they can get what they never knew they always wanted.

We have also addressed various bug fixes in this release.

Introducing Community Intelligence. A new feature linked to your timeline. Gossip with other Libras, commiserate with other Pisces, polish the bones of human experience with other Scorpios, etc.
Shared knowledge is the root of our collective power.
XOXO

Also part of this release is a major stability update.
